metadata.title: CVE-2023-28332 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: If the algebra filter was enabled but not functional (eg the necessarybinaries were missing from the server), it presented an XSS risk.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
